def_cn: （多建于古希腊、古罗马时期的）圆形露天大剧场
def_en: An amphitheatre is a large open area surrounded by rows of seats sloping upwards. Amphitheatres were built mainly in Greek and Roman times for the performance of plays.

def_cn: （部分或整个被包围的）露天场地，圆形凹地
def_en: You can describe land which partly or completely surrounds an open area as an amphitheatre.
